name: glyph-crypt
description: Combines stegnography and encryption with homoglyphs
author: Tyratox (Nico Hauser)

scripts.test-encode: node cli.js encode test/text.txt test/message.svg test/encoded.txt resources/twitter.txt true
scripts.test-decode: node cli.js decode test/encoded.txt resources/twitter.txt test/decoded.svg true
